solution_line_template: Working together, they can decorate {mia_eggs_per_hour} + {billy_eggs_per_hour} = <<{mia_eggs_per_hour}+{billy_eggs_per_hour}={combined_eggs_per_hour}>>{combined_eggs_per_hour} eggs per hour.
It will take them {total_eggs_needed} / {combined_eggs_per_hour} = <<{total_eggs_needed}/{combined_eggs_per_hour}={time_to_decorate}>>{time_to_decorate} hours to decorate all of the eggs.
